data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peredo, Luis Cervantes, Brailovsky, Harry (2014): Two new endemic species of Lygaeinae from Baja California, Mexico (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Lygaeidae). Zootaxa 3861 (6): 591-597, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3861.6.6
